entry.content:
About Me

A PhD candidate in the field of materials science.

Education

  • 2012-2015
    Hefei No.1 High School, Hefei, China
  • 2015-2019
    School of Materials Science and Engineering, Northeastern University, Shenyang, China
  • 2019-now
    National Synchrotron Radiation Laboratory, University of Science and Technology of China, Hefei, China

Selected publishions

-first/co-first author

[3] L. Li#, M. Hu#, C.L. Hu, B.W. Li, S.G. Zhao, T. Zhou, J.L. Zhu, M.L. Liu, G.B. Zhang, L.B. Li, J. Jiang, C.W. Zou*, Ultrahigh effective diffusion in oxide by engineering the interfacial transporter channels, Nano Lett., ASAP, 2023
DOI: 10.1021/acs.nanolett.3c01139
[2] X.Y. Zhou#, L. Li#, B.W.Li, C.L. Hu, Y.L. Cheng, S.G. Zhao, G.B. Zhang, C.W. Zou*, The crystallization dependent electron-proton synergistic doping for hydrogenation of WO3 film, Vacuum 199 (2022) 110980
DOI: 10.1016/j.vacuum.2022.110980
[1] C.L. Hu#, L. Li#, X.L. Wen, Y.L. Chen, B.W. Li, H. Ren, S.G. Zhao, C.W. Zou*, Manipulating the anisotropic phase separation in strained VO2 epitaxial films by nanoscale ion-implantation, Appl. Phys. Lett., 119 (2021) 121101
DOI: 10.1063/5.0060739
